summary: Created new minimal Vite scaffold for GitHub Pages deployment. Replaced package.json with minimal dependencies (React 18, Vite, TypeScript only). Updated vite.config.ts for GitHub Pages (base: '/abadan-haly/', build to docs/). Created new minimal components (Header, Gallery, ProductCard) with clean design. Added styles.css with provided design system. Set up product data structure in src/data/products.ts. Updated index.html with SEO and Open Graph tags. Created comprehensive README with deployment instructions. Build verified successful.
current_status: New minimal scaffold complete. Project is now a clean, static carpet gallery ready for GitHub Pages. All old complex features removed. Ready to add product images and deploy.
